lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.
You and a bunch of friends decide that it might be a good idea to try skydiving.
You pay your money and take your lesson.
The man who runs the place has an extremely large belly, smokes a cigar, and has alcohol on his breath.
The plane you are about to fly in is patched with that silver tape that is used for air conditioning ducts.
The man hesitates when he hands you your parachute, mumbles, "I think that's the one with the hole in it," then gives you another.
The man has to bang the engine of the plane with a hammer to get it going.

You fall for what seems to be at least 70 seconds, then there is a jerk and you look up to see the parachute billowing open. You glide down toward the earth and experience one of the most exhilarating feelings of your life.
